answers.answer: That's not good hun, you need to call your dr asap

Put your feet up as often as possible. Also call your doc to rule out preeclampsia

question: Extremely painful swelling in legs, feet, ankles..any mommies out there have any suggestions to relieve the pain. I am 29 weeks 6days...the swelling has been going on since about 22 weeks but in the last couple of weeks it has gotten worse and more painful.
title: painful
